title: Westworld and the Future of AI, with James Marsden
description:
Neil deGrasse Tyson sits down with Westworld star James Marsden to explore the future of artificial intelligence. Featuring comic co-host Chuck Nice, philosopher Susan Schneider, AI robot Sophia, and neuroscientist David Eagleman, PhD.


NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons and All-Access subscribers can listen to this entire episode commercial-free.

Photo Credit: Kris Denton.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
